attributes.action: increase the minimum wage, plus Pension Credit and income-related benefits, by the rate by which energy prices have risen rather than by the September inflation rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this is fairly self-explanatory.  Since Mr. Brown refuses to impose a windfall tax (currently; 7/9/08) this seems the best way to help low-income families and to prevent more of them going into fuel poverty.  I DO agree with his proposals to help with insulation, and similar conservation measures, but these will take a long time to come into effect; what are people on low incomes to do in the meantime?
